name: Nia's Quest
description:
Nia’s Quest is a top-down action game where you use only 3 magical abilities to survive waves and defend a Beacon. Enemies and abilities are attuned to one of 3 Powers, each of which has its own strength and weakness that you will discover while playing. Between each wave you can choose new abilities based on the enemies you will face in the next wave. You must choose your abilities strategically if you wish to succeed.

 

This game was made for the Power of Three GameJam at by the GameDev club at McGill University. It was developed by Matteo Zamaria and Conner Fritz.
